title: Time to Buy Apple Stock for More Upside as Earnings Approach?
text: Edging out some nice gains this year all eyes are on Apple (AAPL) this week with the company set to release its fiscal second-quarter earnings on Thursday, May 4.

title: Will Slowing Services Growth Hurt Apple's (AAPL) Q2 Earnings?
text: Apple's (AAPL) second-quarter fiscal 2023 results are expected to reflect a slowing Services business, and weakness in the Mac and iPad segments.

title: Apple is about to rain billions more on investors as cash position shrinks
text: The smartphone giant traditionally updates its dividend and buyback policies in conjunction with its March-quarter earnings report, and analysts are expecting another big payday for investors when Apple AAPL posts results Thursday afternoon.

title: Apple expected to announce $90 billion in buybacks and dividends when it reports earnings
text: Regardless of its quarterly results, Apple will remind investors of how much cash it generates and its extreme profitability.

title: What Lies Ahead for Apple ETFs in Fiscal Q2 Earnings?
text: Apple has returned about 30% so far this year, outperforming the industry's gain of 24.2%. The momentum is expected to continue if the company's earnings beat estimates in the soon-to-be-reported quarter.

title: All Eyes on Fed Rate Decision: Key Stocks to Watch
text: The Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) is widely expected to pull the trigger on another 25-basis point (0.25%) rate hike today. But given three of the largest U.S. bank failures in recent months, will the Fed stay the course?

title: Apple Earnings Preview: Bull vs Bear Case for AAPL Stock
text: Apple  AAPL , the unequivocal king of the stock market reports earnings Thursday, May 4 after the market closes. As the world's leading consumer products and technology company, Apple's earnings act as an important bellwether for the broader economy.

title: Apple Stock to Gain From 'Flight to Safety' Even If Earnings Underwhelm
text: J.P. Morgan notes that Apple stock, and other Big Tech names, are gaining amid economic uncertainty. The movement could outweigh the iPhone maker's near-term fundamentals.

title: Match says it's ‘very possible' Apple-Epic ruling could result in App Store fee relief
text: Dating app giant Match Group believes it's “very possible” that the recent Apple-Epic Games antitrust appeals ruling, though largely in favor of Apple, may result in App Store fee relief for developers.

title: Apple Inc (AAPL) Test
text: Apple Inc ( AAPL , Financial) Test Apple Inc ( AAPL , Financial) Test Apple Inc ( AAPL , Financial) Test Apple Inc ( AAPL , Financial) Test

title: These 3 Growth Stocks Were Star Performers in April, and They're Still Buys
text: A host of companies have crushed first-quarter expectations so far, sending their stock prices higher. Three technology names in particular stood out, and they have the potential to deliver further gains for investors.

title: Prediction: 2 Growth Stocks Will Be Worth $3 Trillion by 2030 (Besides Apple)
text: Apple was the first company to hit $3 trillion, but Microsoft and Amazon could cross that threshold by 2030. Microsoft offers a broad number of mission-critical software products and cloud services, and its partnership with OpenAI could add to its momentum.

title: Only 2 Companies Are AAA Rated As U.S. Risks Being A Deadbeat
text: Lawmakers are playing chicken with the debt ceiling. Luckily there are still two U.S. S&P 500 companies left with AAA credit ratings.

title: Apple, Tesla, and Nvidia Have Propped Up the S&P 500. Powell May Fuel More Gains.
text: Megacap tech stocks have led the S&P 500 higher this year. The reason why further highlights the importance of Wednesday's Fed decision for markets.

title: Apple results could mark weak finish to Big Tech earnings
text: Apple Inc will likely report a more than 4% drop in revenue, its second straight quarterly decline, weighed down by consumers shunning non-essential purchases such as iPhones and Mac computers and slowing growth at its services business.

title: Apple and Google team up to tackle AirTag stalking
text: Apple and Google have teamed up to thwart people who try to track others using devices designed to help find lost keys and luggage.

title: 2 Smartest Tech Stocks to Buy in 2023 and Beyond
text: Tech stocks have long been a haven for those looking for reliable long-term investments. Nvidia is a compelling option thanks to its position as the primary supplier of chips powering ChatGPT.
